name: Bloodmaze
description:
Do you have what it takes to beat the highscores of friends and foes?

In this High paced Maze game you can't see the walls until you run into them and use your own blood as a resource. Memorize the layout of each level and beat the game with the fastest time! How will you handle the maze when time and blood is limited?

This game was created at Yrgo- Game Programmer in Gothenburg, Sweden.
